targetQuery.targetQuery: SELECT rowc, colc FROM random10testing WHERE (rowc >= 500 AND rowc <= 742.5 AND  colc >= 900 AND colc <= 1100 )
targetQuery.original_targetQuery: SELECT rowc, colc FROM testing WHERE (rowc >= 662.5 AND rowc <= 702.5 AND  colc >= 992 AND colc <= 1053 )
targetQuery.smaller_targetQuery: SELECT rowc, colc FROM testing WHERE (rowc >= 685.5 AND rowc <= 695.5 AND  colc >= 1040 AND colc <= 1055 )
targetQuery.medium_targetQuery: SELECT rowc, colc FROM testing WHERE (rowc >= 642.5 AND rowc <= 722.5 AND  colc >= 962 AND colc <= 1083 )
targetQuery.large_targetQuery: SELECT rowc, colc FROM testing WHERE (rowc >= 622.5 AND rowc <= 742.5 AND  colc >= 932 AND colc <= 1113 )

query_UU.targetQuery: SELECT i_start_end_difference, i_days_to_close FROM "ITEM" WHERE (i_start_end_difference >= -5 AND i_start_end_difference <= 3 AND  i_days_to_close >= 1 AND i_days_to_close <= 6 )

query_US.targetQuery: SELECT i_num_bids, i_days_to_close FROM "ITEM" WHERE (i_num_bids >= 15 AND i_num_bids <= 20 AND  i_days_to_close >= -6 AND i_days_to_close <= -1 )
